description: Creates a copy of the incoming message and sets the properties either to a static value or a value from the referenced message.

properties.name: properties
properties.label: Properties
properties.description: Provide the names of the properties of the message that should be set to a value. Other existing properties will be left untouched.

properties.name: types
properties.label: Types
properties.description: Provide the corresponding types of the properties. Possible types are 'boolean', 'string', 'integer', 'long', 'double', 'float'

properties.name: values
properties.label: Values
properties.description: Provide the corresponding values to set. Either enter a static value or use {propertyname} to use a property value of the referenced message. To set the current time in milliseconds, use [time]. Specify [null] to delete the property.
